subject: Control box fault
description_text:
Hello, I have buy recently your pro x ultra pedals with haptic reactor (VAM
PRO) from your site. yesterday the haptic on the clutch pedal started to
vibrate non stop, even when my pc is not on, I have tried to swap the brake
and clutch haptic connection and I can confirm is the control box. I was
wondering if i could get a replacement please.

Kind regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Alessandro Porta,  If this happens, it indicates that the computerâ€™s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
